languages.text: "Вы про госпожу Эмелину, уважаем{mf|ый|ая} госпо{mf|дин|жа}? Так ведь без нее бы мы и не выжили. Так сошлось, что здесь она была, на местной раскопке, когда твари вылезать начали. С тех пор теряем связь с другими местами на планете — словно свечи задувают, ясно уже, что сгинули. А мы ничего... держимся!"

traits.locale_text: "Вы про госпожу Эмелину? Так ведь без нее бы мы и не выжили. Так сошлось, что здесь она была, на местной раскопке, когда твари вылезать начали. С тех пор теряем связь с другими местами на планете — словно свечи задувают. А мы ничего... держимся!"

languages.text: "You mean Mistress Lichtenhart, my {mf|lord|lady}? We wouldn't have survived without her. It just so happened that she was here, at a local excavation, when the monsters started appearing. We've been losing contact with the other sites on the planet since then, like candles being snuffed out one after another. The rest of them must have all perished. But we're still here... holding on!"
languages.original_text: "Вы про госпожу Эмелину, уважаем{mf|ый|ая} госпо{mf|дин|жа}? Так ведь без нее бы мы и не выжили. Так сошлось, что здесь она была, на местной раскопке, когда твари вылезать начали. С тех пор теряем связь с другими местами на планете — словно свечи задувают, ясно уже, что сгинули. А мы ничего... держимся!"

We've been losing contact with the other sites on the planet since then, like candles being snuffed out one after another. The rest of them must have all perished. But we're still here... holding on!"

languages.text: “你指的是莱肯哈特女主人吗，大人？如果不是她，我们根本不可能幸免于难。那群怪物刚刚冒出来的时候，她刚好就在这里，在这片地区的挖掘场。从那个时候起，这颗行星其他的挖掘场就和我们慢慢失去了联系，就像蜡烛被一根接一根吹灭一样。剩下的人肯定都死了，可我们依然活着……依然在努力坚持！”
languages.original_text: "You mean Mistress Lichtenhart, my {mf|lord|lady}? We wouldn't have survived without her. It just so happened that she was here, at a local excavation, when the monsters started appearing. We've been losing contact with the other sites on the planet since then, like candles being snuffed out one after another. The rest of them must have all perished. But we're still here... holding on!"

traits.locale_text: “你指的是莱肯哈特女主人吗，大人？如果不是她，我们根本不可能幸免于难。那群怪物刚刚冒出来的时候，她刚好就在这里，在这片地区的挖掘场。从那个时候起，这颗行星其他的挖掘场就和我们慢慢失去了联系，就像蜡烛被一根接一根吹灭一样。剩下的人肯定都死了，可我们依然活着……依然在努力坚持！”

languages.text: «¿Se refiere a la maestra Lichtenhart, mi{mf|lord|lady}? No habríamos sobrevivido de no ser por ella. Dio la casualidad de que estaba aquí, en una excavación local, cuando los monstruos empezaron a aparecer. Hemos estado perdiendo el contacto con otras zonas del planeta desde entonces, como si apagaran una vela tras otra. Imagino que todos habrán muerto. Pero nosotros seguimos aquí... ¡aguantando!».
languages.original_text: "You mean Mistress Lichtenhart, my {mf|lord|lady}? We wouldn't have survived without her. It just so happened that she was here, at a local excavation, when the monsters started appearing. We've been losing contact with the other sites on the planet since then, like candles being snuffed out one after another. The rest of them must have all perished. But we're still here... holding on!"

traits.locale_text: «¿Se refiere a la maestra Lichtenhart, mi{mf|lord|lady}? No habríamos sobrevivido de no ser por ella. Dio la casualidad de que estaba aquí, en una excavación local, cuando los monstruos empezaron a aparecer. Hemos estado perdiendo el contacto con otras zonas del planeta desde entonces, como si apagaran una vela tras otra. Imagino que todos habrán muerto. Pero nosotros seguimos aquí... ¡aguantando!».

languages.text: 「つまり、リヒテンハルト様、我々の陛下ですか？あの方なしでは私たちは生きていけなかったでしょう。怪物たちが現れ始めたとき、ここ、地元の発掘現場にあの方がいたのは偶然でした。私たちは他の現場とは連絡が取れなくなりました。それ以来、この星の他の場所は、まるでろうそくの火が次々に消えていくかのように１つ、また１つと消えていった。残りの場所はすべて滅んだに違いありません。でも、私たちはまだここにいる…なんとか！」
languages.original_text: "You mean Mistress Lichtenhart, my {mf|lord|lady}? We wouldn't have survived without her. It just so happened that she was here, at a local excavation, when the monsters started appearing. We've been losing contact with the other sites on the planet since then, like candles being snuffed out one after another. The rest of them must have all perished. But we're still here... holding on!"

traits.locale_text: 「つまり、リヒテンハルト様、我々の陛下ですか？あの方なしでは私たちは生きていけなかったでしょう。怪物たちが現れ始めたとき、ここ、地元の発掘現場にあの方がいたのは偶然でした。私たちは他の現場とは連絡が取れなくなりました。それ以来、この星の他の場所は、まるでろうそくの火が次々に消えていくかのように１つ、また１つと消えていった。残りの場所はすべて滅んだに違いありません。でも、私たちはまだここにいる…なんとか！」

languages.text: « Vous parlez de maîtresse Lichtenhart, {mf|mon seigneur|ma dame} ? Nous n'aurions pas survécu sans elle. Il se trouve qu'elle était ici, sur un site de fouilles local, lorsque les monstres ont commencé à apparaître. Depuis, nous avons perdu le contact avec les autres sites de la planète, comme des bougies soufflées l'une après l'autre. Ils sont sûrement morts à l'heure qu'il est, mais nous sommes toujours là... Nous résistons ! »
languages.original_text: "You mean Mistress Lichtenhart, my {mf|lord|lady}? We wouldn't have survived without her. It just so happened that she was here, at a local excavation, when the monsters started appearing. We've been losing contact with the other sites on the planet since then, like candles being snuffed out one after another. The rest of them must have all perished. But we're still here... holding on!"

traits.locale_text: « Vous parlez de maîtresse Lichtenhart, {mf|mon seigneur|ma dame} ? Nous n'aurions pas survécu sans elle. Il se trouve qu'elle était ici, sur un site de fouilles local, lorsque les monstres ont commencé à apparaître. Depuis, nous avons perdu le contact avec les autres sites de la planète, comme des bougies soufflées l'une après l'autre. Ils sont sûrement morts à l'heure qu'il est, mais nous sommes toujours là... Nous résistons ! »

languages.text: "Meint Ihr Herrin Lichtenhart, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}? Ohne sie hätten wir nicht überlebt. Sie war zufällig hier, bei einer örtlichen Ausgrabung, als die Monster aufgetaucht sind. Wir haben seitdem den Kontakt zu den anderen Anlagen auf dem Planeten verloren, wie Kerzen, die der Reihe nach ausgelöscht wurden. Die anderen müssen alle untergegangen sein. Aber wir sind noch da ... und halten durch!"
languages.original_text: "You mean Mistress Lichtenhart, my {mf|lord|lady}? We wouldn't have survived without her. It just so happened that she was here, at a local excavation, when the monsters started appearing. We've been losing contact with the other sites on the planet since then, like candles being snuffed out one after another. The rest of them must have all perished. But we're still here... holding on!"

traits.locale_text: "Meint Ihr Herrin Lichtenhart, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}? Ohne sie hätten wir nicht überlebt. Sie war zufällig hier, bei einer örtlichen Ausgrabung, als die Monster aufgetaucht sind. Wir haben seitdem den Kontakt zu den anderen Anlagen auf dem Planeten verloren, wie Kerzen, die der Reihe nach ausgelöscht wurden. Die anderen müssen alle untergegangen sein. Aber wir sind noch da ... und halten durch!"

languages.text: "Lichtenhart Hanım'ı mı diyorsunuz {mf|lordum|leydim}? O olmasaydı hayatta kalamazdık. Canavarlar ortaya çıkmaya başladığında neyse ki burada, yerel kazı alanındaydı. O günden beri gezegendeki diğer kazı alanlarıyla irtibatı kaybettik. Birbiri ardına sönen mumlar gibi. Geri kalan herkes yok olmuş olmalı ama biz hâlâ dayanıyoruz!"
languages.original_text: "You mean Mistress Lichtenhart, my {mf|lord|lady}? We wouldn't have survived without her. It just so happened that she was here, at a local excavation, when the monsters started appearing. We've been losing contact with the other sites on the planet since then, like candles being snuffed out one after another. The rest of them must have all perished. But we're still here... holding on!"

traits.locale_text: "Lichtenhart Hanım'ı mı diyorsunuz {mf|lordum|leydim}? O olmasaydı hayatta kalamazdık. Canavarlar ortaya çıkmaya başladığında neyse ki burada, yerel kazı alanındaydı.
